xxl.core.io.fat
Class EntriesFilterIterator

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.io.fat.EntriesFilterIterator
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.Iterator
public class EntriesFilterIterator
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Iterator

This iterator returns filtered entries of the directory. The user can specify by flags which entries should be filtered. The allowed flags are the constant LIST_XXX values of the DIR class.

remove

public void remove()
Removes from the underlying collection the last element that was returned by the iterator (optional operation). This method can be called only once for each next method call. The behavior of an iterator is unspecified if the underlying collection has been modified during the iteration progress in any other way than this method.

Specified by:
remove in interface java.util.Iterator
